text: thumb Dana Hill (born Dana Lynne Goetz; May 6, 1964-July 15, 1996) was an American voice actress. She has a raspy voice. She starred in television programs and movies, including Goof Troop (1992-1993). She died resulting from a stroke that was due to having type 1 diabetes (she was diagnosed at age 10). Hill was born around California. Category:American voice actors Category:American television actors Category:Deaths from diabetes Category:Deaths from stroke Category:1964 births Category:1996 deaths
title: Dana Hill
